The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 December is 2,090,446 (3,713.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 25 December, there were 210,490 new confirmed cases (374.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 December, there were 184,091 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 14% (26,399 extra cases).
